TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void SheetHandler(Cocoa.Window sheet, int returnCode, IntPtr contextInfo);

Docs.param: The object that raised the event.
The return code passed from the method.
The contextInfo object that was specified.
Docs.summary: Defines the shape of methods that are called in response to a sheetDidEnd event.
Docs.remarks: The return code is only relevant when the overloaded method that takes a return code is called.
